channel.title: Juha Liikala - Developer, Designer and Blogger from Oulu, Finland
channel.description: Recent content on Juha Liikala - Developer, Designer and Blogger from Oulu, Finland

item.title: Reading & Journaling.
item.description: While preparing to launch my blog again in January 2018, I’ve been ramping up my reading & journaling efforts to support the process. (If you’re interested, join my 2018 blog waiting list here.) While I read, I have a habit of keeping a paper journal where I write down the best discoveries I make from each book. Also a great way to organize one’s thoughts around any given topic. ##FROM THE BOOK READING LIST:

item.title: About me
item.description: Hi I’m Juha Liikala. I’ve been doing what I do for quite a while now. In fact, it’s been nearly fifteen years since I started “working on the web” for a living. Most of my working days go by swimming in the sea of front-end web technologies (and hopefully, trying to stay afloat). Travel has been part of my DNA ever since my parents first took me abroad back in the 80’s.
